name: Humuslight® 30 M.O.
description: Humuslight® 30 M.O. is an excellent liquid amendment that provides organic matter of plant origin to the soil. The product improves the structure of the soil, its water retention capacity, the availability of nutrients for crops and the growth of beneficial soil microorganisms for plants. The product is recommended in soils with low levels of organic matter and also in soils with other chemical or physical limitations, such as very thick texture, compaction, waterlogging, salinization, contamination and soils with a history of unbalanced fertilization.
